original_text: Many a time I went from one synagogue to another to have them punished, and I tried to force them to blaspheme. I was so obsessed with persecuting them that I even hunted them down in foreign cities.
korean_text: 또 모든 회당에서 여러 번 형벌하여 강제로 모독하는 말을 하게 하고 그들에 대하여 심히 격분하여 외국 성에까지 가서 박해하였고

sentences.original_text: Many a time I went from one synagogue to another
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 번 나는 한 회당에서 다른 회당으로 다니며

sentences.original_text: and I tried to force them to blaspheme
I was so obsessed with persecuting them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 핍박하는 것에 너무 집착해서

sentences.original_text: that I even hunted them down in foreign cities
